name: watchman-processor
description: File synchronizer with a simple dashboard
author: Markis Taylor <m@rkis.cc>

scripts.compile:test: if-ver -ge 0.12 && rollup -c rollup.config.js -e tslib -i test/index.ts -o test.js || if-ver -lt 0.12
scripts.coverage: if-ver -ge 0.12 && npm run compile:test && istanbul cover _mocha test.js -x example/watchman-processor.config.js --report lcovonly || if-ver -lt 0.12
scripts.coverage:remap: if-ver -ge 4 && npm run coverage && remap-istanbul --type html -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/report  || if-ver -lt 4
scripts.lint: if-ver -ge 4 && tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts test/*.ts || if-ver -lt 4
scripts.test: tsc --noemit && npm run lint && npm run coverage:remap
